trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static (Shared in Visual Basic) methods for working with specific kinds of <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona un conjunto de métodos estáticos (Shared en Visual Basic) para que funcionen con determinados tipos de instancias de <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Task<Task>" /> (C#) or <see langword="Task (Of Task)" /> (Visual Basic) to unwrap.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Task<Task>" /> (C#) o <see langword="Task (Of Task)" /> (Visual Basic) que se va a desempaquetar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a proxy <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that represents the asynchronous operation of a <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.TryExecuteTaskInline(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un proxy <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> que representa el funcionamiento asincrónico de <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.TryExecuteTaskInline(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Boolean)" />.

trans-unit.source: A Task that represents the asynchronous operation of the provided <see langword="System.Threading.Tasks.Task(Of Task)" />.
trans-unit.target: Tarea que representa la operación asincrónica del objeto <see langword="System.Threading.Tasks.Task(Of Task)" /> proporcionado.

trans-unit.source: It is often useful to be able to return a Task from a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>, where the inner Task represents work done as part of the outer <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>.
trans-unit.target: A menudo resulta útil poder devolver una tarea desde una <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>, donde la tarea interna representa el trabajo realizado como parte de la actividad <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>.

trans-unit.source: However, doing so results in a `Task<Task>` (C#) or `Task (Of Task)` (Visual Basic), which, if not dealt with carefully, could produce unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, ya que se producirá en un `Task<Task>` (C#) o `Task (Of Task)` (Visual Basic), que, si no se trata con cuidado, podría generar un comportamiento inesperado.

trans-unit.source: Unwrap solves this problem by creating a proxy Task that represents the entire asynchronous operation of such a task.
trans-unit.target: Unwrap resuelve este problema mediante la creación de una tarea que representa toda la operación asincrónica de una tarea de este tipo de proxy.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to unwrap a task:
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo desencapsular una tarea:

trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown if the <paramref name="task" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: La excepción que se produce si el argumento <paramref name="task" /> es NULL.

trans-unit.source: The type of the task's result.
trans-unit.target: Tipo del resultado de la tarea.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Task<Task<T>>" /> (C#) or <see langword="Task (Of Task(Of T))" /> (Visual Basic) to unwrap.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Task<Task<T>>" /> (C#) o <see langword="Task (Of Task(Of T))" /> (Visual Basic) que se va a desempaquetar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a proxy <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that represents the asynchronous operation of a <see langword="Task<Task<T>>" /> (C#) or <see langword="Task (Of Task(Of T))" /> (Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Crea una <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> de proxy que representa la operación asincrónica de <see langword="Task<Task<T>>" /> (C#) o <see langword="Task (Of Task(Of T))" /> (Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that represents the asynchronous operation of the provided <see langword="Task<Task<T>>" /> (C#) or <see langword="Task (Of Task(Of T))" /> (Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> que representa la operación asincrónica del <see langword="Task<Task<T>>" /> (C#) o <see langword="Task (Of Task(Of T))" /> (Visual Basic) proporcionado.

trans-unit.source: It is often useful to be able to return a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> from a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>, where the inner <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> represents work done as part of the outer <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>.
trans-unit.target: A menudo resulta útil poder devolver un <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> desde una <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>, donde interna <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> representa el trabajo realizado como parte de la actividad <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>.

trans-unit.source: However, doing so results in a `Task<Task<T>>` (C#) or `Task (Of Task(Of T))` (Visual Basic), which, if not dealt with carefully, could produce unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, ya que se producirá en un `Task<Task<T>>` (C#) o `Task (Of Task(Of T))` (Visual Basic), que, si no se trata con cuidado, podría generar un comportamiento inesperado.

trans-unit.source: Unwrap solves this problem by creating a proxy <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> that represents the entire asynchronous operation of such a `Task<Task<T>>` (C#) or `Task (Of Task(Of T))` (Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Unwrap resuelve este problema mediante la creación de un proxy <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> que representa toda la operación asincrónica de como un `Task<Task<T>>` (C#) o `Task (Of Task(Of T))` (Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown if the <paramref name="task" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: La excepción que se produce si el argumento <paramref name="task" /> es NULL.
